title: A Modern Comedy - the word "luxury" is interpreted

content.question: The word “luxury” in the second paragraph is best interpreted as suggesting that Soames

choices.label: thinks of art only in monetary terms
expects to have his whims catered to
views emotions as experiences to be savored
regards his grief as frivolous and undignified

content.answer: views emotions as experiences to be savored

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
